events.title: The College Dropout
events.longDescription: The College Dropout is the debut studio album by Kanye West, released in 2004. It received critical acclaim for its innovative production, introspective lyrics, and unique blend of hip-hop and soul.

events.title: Graduation
events.longDescription: Graduation is Kanye West's third studio album, released in 2007. It features the hit singles 'Stronger' and 'Good Life' and explores themes of personal growth and ambition.

events.title: My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy
events.longDescription: My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy is Kanye West's fifth studio album, released in 2010. It received widespread critical acclaim for its ambitious production, provocative lyrics, and innovative musical style. The album is often regarded as one of the greatest albums of all time.

events.title: Watch the Throne
events.longDescription: Watch the Throne is a collaborative album by Kanye West and Jay-Z, released in 2011. The album features a fusion of their respective musical styles and includes guest appearances from artists like Beyonc√© and Frank Ocean. It received positive reviews and achieved commercial success.

events.title: Yeezus
events.longDescription: Yeezus is Kanye West's sixth studio album, released in 2013. It takes a more experimental and abrasive musical direction, incorporating elements of industrial, electronic, and punk music. Despite mixed initial reactions, the album is considered a significant artistic achievement.

events.title: The Life of Pablo
events.longDescription: The Life of Pablo is Kanye West's seventh studio album, released in 2016 exclusively on the streaming platform Tidal. The album features a diverse range of guest artists and explores themes of faith, fame, and personal struggles. It received mixed reviews but was a commercial success.

events.title: Ye
events.longDescription: Ye is Kanye West's eighth studio album, released in 2018. It features a more introspective and personal tone, addressing West's mental health struggles, controversies, and his relationships. The album received mixed reviews but resonated with many fans.

events.title: Donda
events.shortDescription: Album named after his late mother
events.longDescription: Donda is Kanye West's tenth studio album, released in 2021. It is named after his late mother, Donda West, and serves as a tribute to her. The album received positive reviews and debuted at the top of the charts, showcasing West's artistic vision and versatility.

events.title: Yeezy Gap Collaboration
events.longDescription: Kanye West announces a collaboration with fashion brand Gap in 2022. The collaboration, known as 'Yeezy Gap,' brings West's distinctive fashion aesthetic to a wider audience with a line of apparel and accessories.

events.title: Ongoing Influence and Artistic Ventures
events.shortDescription: Continuing impact on music, fashion, and culture
events.longDescription: As of the current date, Kanye West continues to be an influential figure in music, fashion, and popular culture. His artistic ventures, personal life, and public statements continue to draw attention and spark discussions.
